breakfast.name: High-Protein Chicken & Rice Bowl
breakfast.description: A simple, protein-packed breakfast bowl featuring grilled chicken breast and fluffy rice with vegetables.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked
Dice bell pepper and sauté for 3-4 minutes
Slice cooked chicken and arrange over rice
Add sautéed bell peppers and serve

dinner.name: High-Protein Chicken and Rice Bowl
dinner.description: A simple, protein-packed bowl featuring grilled chicken breast over brown rice with vegetables.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 165°F
Steam broccoli for 5 minutes until tender-crisp
Slice cooked chicken breast
Assemble bowl with rice as base, topped with sliced chicken and broccoli

lunch.name: Garlic Chicken & Brown Rice Bowl
lunch.description: A simple high-protein lunch bowl featuring lean chicken breast and nutritious brown rice.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Add minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds
Add chicken pieces and cook until golden and cooked through (about 8 minutes)
Steam broccoli for 5 minutes until tender-crisp
Combine rice, chicken, and broccoli in a bowl
Season with salt and pepper to taste

dinner.name: High-Protein Chicken and Rice Bowl
dinner.description: A simple yet satisfying high-protein meal with grilled chicken breast and brown rice.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Grill or pan-sear chicken in olive oil until fully cooked (internal temp 165°F)
Steam broccoli until tender-crisp
Slice chicken and arrange over rice with broccoli on the side

breakfast.name: High-Protein Chicken & Rice Bowl
breakfast.description: A simple, protein-packed breakfast bowl with seasoned chicken breast and fluffy rice.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked
In a separate pan, fry the egg
Slice the cooked chicken
Assemble bowl with rice on the bottom, sliced chicken, and top with fried egg

lunch.name: High-Protein Chicken and Rice Bowl
lunch.description: A simple, protein-packed bowl with seasoned chicken breast and fluffy rice, perfect for a high-protein lunch.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 165°F
Steam broccoli for 5 minutes until tender-crisp
Slice cooked chicken and arrange over rice
Add broccoli on the side and serve

dinner.description: A simple, protein-packed bowl with seasoned chicken breast and fluffy rice.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds
Add chicken and cook for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked
